aka: 侏罗纪公园非官方重述

writer.name: 杰瑞米·亚当斯 Jeremy Adams

this_title: LEGO  Jurassic Park The Unofficial Retelling
trans_title: 侏罗纪公园非官方重述
introduction: 混沌数学家伊恩·马尔科姆（Ian Malcolm）博士在找到他的日记后，回忆起30年前岛上游乐园的不幸和混乱，那里充满了史前恐龙，它们逃跑并疯狂奔跑......一个故事：6500万块砖块在制作中。After finding his journal, Chaos Mathematician Dr. Ian Malcolm recalls the mishaps and mayhem from 30 years ago about the island amusement park filled with prehistoric dinosaurs who escape and run amok...a story 65 million bricks in the making.
foreign_title: LEGO  Jurassic Park The Unofficial Retelling
